Just so it is with the establishment of institutions. No person, no institution, is to be so bound about that this principle of service for others must be violated. Some are already bound; but the Lord desires to have them set free. In the night season it seemed as if I were watching those upon whom yokes were being put. Then One in 


                               -207- 

authority came forward and broke every yoke, saying, "I make no such yokes. Let every one stand in his God-given independence, and yet remain humble as a little child."
